faq.question: Is it really lossless?
faq.answer: Lossless means we try to preserve as much detail as possible. Generating high-res from low-res involves prediction, and our algorithms minimize artifacts.

faq.question: Difference between Smooth and Sharp?
faq.answer: Smooth is better for photos to reduce noise. Sharp is better for text, line art, and illustrations to keep edges crisp.

faq.question: Why is it slow sometimes?
faq.answer: Processing speed depends on image size and scale factor. 4x upscaling a large image requires significant computation.

About.meta_desc: Learn about AI Image Tools' mission, technology, and free online image processing services. Secure, efficient, local processing.
About.title: About Us
About.description: AI Image Tools is a platform focused on providing efficient, secure, and convenient online image processing services.
About.mission_content: In this digital age, image processing has become a daily need. Our mission is to break the barriers of professional software and use advanced Web technology to provide free, secure, and efficient image processing tools for every user. Whether you are a designer, developer, or casual user, you can easily get your work done here without worrying about privacy leaks or complex installation processes.
About.feature_local_desc: All image processing is done in your browser, no upload to server. Your data never leaves your device, completely eliminating privacy risks.
About.feature_free_desc: We promise all basic features are free forever. No paywalls, no limits, making quality tools accessible to everyone.
About.feature_no_login_desc: Say goodbye to tedious registration processes. Open the website and use all features instantly, saving your time and improving efficiency.
About.feature_fast_desc: Powered by WebAssembly, image processing speed rivals native software. No waiting for uploads/downloads, millisecond-level response.
About.tech_desc: AI Image Tools uses cutting-edge frontend stack to ensure best performance and user experience:
tech_list: WebAssembly (Wasm): Runs high-performance code directly in the browser, achieving near-native speeds.
ONNX Runtime Web: Runs AI models directly in the browser for real-time background removal without backend APIs.
Modern Web Workers: Uses multi-threading to ensure smooth UI even when processing large images.
PWA Support: Supports offline access and installation to desktop, providing a native app-like experience.

Contact.meta_desc: Questions or feedback? Contact the AI Image Tools team via email or GitHub.
Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: We value your feedback. Whether it's a feature suggestion, bug report, or just a greeting, we'd love to hear from you.
Contact.faq_desc: Check our FAQ for quick help.

FAQ.meta_desc: Common questions about AI Image Tools. Learn about image compression, privacy, supported formats, and AI background removal.
FAQ.meta_keywords: faq, questions, image compression guide, privacy policy, supported formats
FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Here are the most common questions about AI Image Tools. If you can't find an answer, feel free to contact us.

items.question: How does image compression work? Does it affect quality?
items.answer: Our smart compression algorithm reduces file size by optimizing image encoding and removing redundant metadata. For lossy compression, we reduce data within a range invisible to the naked eye; for lossless compression, quality remains unaffected.

items.question: Are my images uploaded to a server?
items.answer: No. We promise that all image processing is done locally in your browser (Local Processing). Your image data never leaves your device, ensuring 100% privacy.

items.question: Which image formats are supported?
items.answer: We currently support compression and conversion for common formats like JPG, PNG, WebP, AVIF, GIF. Specific supported formats depend on the tool you use.

items.question: Is there a file size limit?
items.answer: Since processing is local, there is no strict limit, but it depends on your device's memory. We generally recommend images under 50MB for smooth browser performance.

items.question: How does AI background removal work?
items.answer: We use advanced computer vision models (like RMBG or U2Net) running directly in the browser via WebAssembly. The model automatically identifies the subject and separates it from the background.

items.question: Can I process images in batch?
items.answer: Yes, we support batch processing. You can select multiple images at once for compression, format conversion, or resizing, and download them all with one click.

items.question: Is this tool free?
items.answer: Yes, all basic functions of AI Image Tools are completely free to use, with no registration required and no hidden fees.

items.question: Can I use it offline?
items.answer: Yes. Our website uses PWA (Progressive Web App) technology. Once you've visited and loaded resources, most local processing functions work offline.

items.question: Can compressed images be used for printing?
items.answer: Depends on your settings. If you choose 'High Quality' or 'Lossless', compressed images are suitable for printing. High compression modes are recommended for screen use only.

items.question: Why is it slow with large images?
items.answer: Because all calculations happen on your device's CPU/GPU. Processing high-resolution images requires significant resources, speed depends on your device performance.

items.question: Why use WebP format?
items.answer: WebP is a modern image format from Google. It reduces file size by 20-30% compared to JPG/PNG while maintaining quality, perfect for web speed.

items.question: Does compression keep EXIF data?
items.answer: By default, we remove EXIF data (camera info, GPS) to minimize size and protect privacy. You may be able to toggle this in settings if supported.

items.question: Which browsers are supported?
items.answer: We recommend the latest Chrome, Edge, Firefox, or Safari. Due to WebAssembly usage, very old browsers (like IE) may not work.

items.question: Does it work on mobile?
items.answer: Yes. Our responsive design works perfectly on iOS and Android browsers, so you can process images on your phone anytime.

PrivacyPage.meta_desc: Privacy policy for AI Image Tools, explaining how we protect your data and privacy.
PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: Welcome to AI Image Tools (hereinafter referred to as "this website"). We attach great importance to your privacy protection. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

processing.title: 2. Data Processing
processing.content: All image processing functions provided by this website (including image compression, format conversion, resizing, QR code generation, AI background removal, watermark addition, etc.) are completed locally in your browser.
list: Your images will not be uploaded to our servers
All image processing takes place entirely on your device
After processing, original images and results exist only on your device
All temporary data will be cleared after closing the browser tab

collection.title: 3. Information We Collect
collection.content: We may collect limited information in the following ways:

list.title: Usage Statistics:
list.content: We may use tools like Google Analytics to collect anonymous website usage statistics, such as visitor numbers and page views. These data do not contain any personally identifiable information.

list.title: Cookies:
list.content: We may use Cookies to improve user experience and provide advertising services. You can choose to disable Cookies in your browser settings.

third_party.title: 4. Third-Party Services
third_party.content: This website may use the following third-party services:

list.title: Google AdSense:
list.content: Used to display ads. Google may use Cookies to provide personalized ads. You can manage your ad preferences on Google's ad settings page.

list.title: Google Analytics:
list.content: Used to analyze website traffic and user behavior.

list.title: Hugging Face:
list.content: Models used for AI background removal are hosted on Hugging Face and downloaded to your browser upon first use.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: Since all image processing happens in your local browser, your image data always remains on your device. We do not access, store, or process any of your image content.

minors.title: 6. Children's Privacy
minors.content: This website does not knowingly collect any personal information from minors under the age of 16. If you are a parent or guardian and discover that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

updates.title: 7. Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Updated policies will be published on this page. We recommend you review it periodically to understand how we protect your privacy.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or suggestions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us via:
